message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.NI, cs.SE, cs.SY 

This paper primarily focuses on the security aspects of using OPC UA as a communication protocol for IIoT applications. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). Additionally, the paper discusses the use of OPC UA in a smart energy system, which falls under the category of cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also discusses the interconnection of entities in IIoT applications, which falls under the category of cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Finally, the paper discusses the lack of security measures in traditional industrial protocols, which falls under the category of cs.SE (Software Engineering).
